page.title: 14EDUCATION_OPPORTUNITIES
page.content: In the local school there are many extra activities.Many of the teachers stay behind after school to run these. Here is a list_ Swimming club,Athletics club,Cricket club,Chess club,Football skills, Football team practice,Netball club, Country Dancing club and Softball Tennis. Two Gymnastics clubs operate as well. I have been very unique,because I have played in the boys football team even though I am a girl!However the F.A. have tried to stop girls playing in matches,but I think its unfair. "What was it like playing in the foot- ball team,Helen?" "It was rather strange at first,but I got used to it.I played in defence and had to tackle several boys to stop them scoring a goal_they did not like it."
